mapper.select: select attend_id,attend_name,am_punch_in_time,am_punch_in_start, am_punch_in_end, noon_punch_out_time,noon_punch_in_time,pm_punch_out_time ,pm_punch_out_start,pm_punch_out_end,work_day from tbl_#{wid}_attend_rule where status=1

select r.attend_id,r.attend_name,r.job_id,r.am_punch_in_time,r.am_punch_in_start,r.am_punch_in_end,r.pm_punch_out_time,r.pm_punch_out_start, r.pm_punch_out_end,r.work_day,j.status from tbl_#{wid}_attend_rule r right join tbl_#{wid}_attend_job j on r.job_id = j.job_id where r.attend_id=#{attend_id}

SELECT p.person_name,p.person_id,d.device_name,DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') record_time,r.recog_type,g.group_name,MIN(r.record_time) am_punch_time,MAX(r.record_time) pm_punch_time, /* 0 正常，1 迟到，2 早退，3 其他 */ CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(MIN(r.record_time),'%H:%i')<=#{am_attend_time} THEN 0 WHEN DATE_FORMAT(MIN(r.record_time),'%H:%i')>#{am_attend_time} THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS am_punch_status, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(MAX(r.record_time),'%H:%i')>=#{pm_attend_time} THEN 0 WHEN DATE_FORMAT(MAX(r.record_time),'%H:%i')<#{pm_attend_time} THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS pm_punch_status FROM tbl_#{wid}_person p RIGHT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_record r ON p.person_id=r.person_id LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_device d ON r.device_id=d.device_id LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_group_person gp ON gp.person_id=p.person_id LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_group g ON gp.group_id = g.group_id RIGHT JOIN /* 时间范围 */ (SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') record_time FROM tbl_#{wid}_record r WHERE DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{date_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{date_start} AND ((DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>=#{am_time_start} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<#{am_time_end}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>=#{pm_time_start} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<=#{pm_time_end}) )) d ON DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')= DATE_FORMAT(d.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
and gp.group_id=#{group_id}
and POSITION(#{keyword} IN p.person_name) OR POSITION(#{keyword} IN d.device_name)
GROUP BY p.person_name,p.person_id,d.device_name,DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),r.recog_type,g.group_name ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') DESC
